alert.note: Alert for Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 4:39PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, northeastern Jones, northern Shackelford and southwestern Throckmorton Counties through 530 PM CST... At 438 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Fort Griffin, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Griffin, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283 and The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
